contact.paragraph:
Do you have a question or like me to do some programming for you?
I am excited to hear from you!
contact.name: Name

contact.errorMessage: Please contact me directly via following email address: hey[at]jencoding.com

work.paragraph: These are the projects I've been working on recently.

pawpal.short: This Get-To-Know App for dog owners was inspired by dating apps. Built in functionalities are the classic dating app swipe, the ability to configure own customer profiles, login and bearer authorization as well as a basic chat functionality.

cwe.short: This app provides a Google Map with over 2000 Coworking Spaces. The API retrieves the data for the markers from the website https://coworkingmap.org with a pagecrawler. The app was deployed to the Google Play Store

bluerizon.short: A Wordpress eCommerce Shop with over 1000 different product variaties. I also built custom Gutenberg Blocks for this shop.
